01_ System_Docs
[EXIT_TERMINAL]

System_Documentation

VELOCITY v2.0.4-Stable :: Handshake_Protocol_Init

Protocol_Requirements

01.SECURE_CONTEXT

SSL/TLS encryption mandatory for environment handshake.

02.NODE_ACCESS

Verified provider injection (PHANTOM/SOLFLARE).

03.LATENCY_SYNC

Optimized for high-frequency sub-second verification.

Implementation_Sequence

[STEP_01] Fetch_Runtime

Integrate the VELOCITY runtime engine into your application environment.

Download_Engine_Bin
[STEP_02] Initialize_Protocol
velocity_init.js
<script type="module">
  import { initVelocity } from "./velocity-engine.js";

  initVelocity({
    targetId: "access-trigger",
    vaultId: "secure-payload",
    to: "SOL_ADDRESS_HERE",
    sol: 0.01,
    handshake: "v-handshake-01"
  });
</script>
[STEP_03] Mount_Containers

Construct the trigger and payload containers in your DOM.

<!-- Trigger Element -->
<button id="access-trigger">INITIALIZE_HANDSHAKE</button>

<!-- Secure Payload -->
<div id="secure-payload" style="display: none;">
  <h1>VAULT_UNLOCKED</h1>
  <p>Encrypted data now visible...</p>
</div>

Protocol_Integrity_Notice

VELOCITY is built for extreme-scale throughput. Ensure your deployment environment maintains a stable WebSocket link for sub-second verification latency. Failure to maintain sync may cause handshake timeouts.
